Line 22: Line 22:
'''Ashampoo Burning Studio''' is one of the most known products of Ashampoo, it is an [[optical disc authoring software|optical disc authoring program]] for [[Microsoft Windows]], developed by Ashampoo, it is one of the most used alternatives to [[Nero (computer software)|Nero Burning ROM]] on Windows, but still not as popular as the later. <br />
'''Ashampoo Burning Studio''' is one of the most known products of Ashampoo, it is an [[optical disc authoring software|optical disc authoring program]] for [[Microsoft Windows]], developed by Ashampoo, it is one of the most used alternatives to [[Nero (computer software)|Nero Burning ROM]] on Windows, but still not as popular as the later. <br />
It's main advantage is that it is a simple program, lightweight, and very easy to use <ref>http://news.softpedia.com/news/CDRWIN-vs-Ashampoo-Burning-Studio-38925.shtml</ref> but that is also one of its weakness: it does not contain lots of extras power-users might find useful. <br />
It's main advantage is that it is a simple program, lightweight, and very easy to use <ref>http://news.softpedia.com/news/CDRWIN-vs-Ashampoo-Burning-Studio-38925.shtml</ref> but that is also one of its weakness: it does not contain lots of extras power-users might find useful. <br />
â
It is capable of creating compilation of [[Compact disc|CD's]], [[DVD|DVD's]] and [[Blu-ray Disc|Blu-Ray Dics]].<br />
+
It is capable of creating compilations of [[Compact disc|CD's]], [[DVD|DVD's]] and [[Blu-ray Disc|Blu-Ray Dics]].<br />
It also allow the creation of DVD movies from video files. <br />
It also allow the creation of DVD movies from video files. <br />
As a way to promote their software, Ashampoo gives away free copies of Ashampoo Burning Studio, but requires the user to give an email adress. [http://www.ashampoo.com/frontend/products/php/product.php?session_langid=2&idstring=0510]
